### NEW STUDENT BRIEFING FOR 2024/2025 SEMESTER 2

#### **Download the briefing slide [HERE](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/New-Student-Briefing-Taklimat-Pelajar-Baru-2024-2025-2-New.pdf "briefing slides")
.**

### POSTGRADUATE BRIEFING FOR SEMINAR REQUIREMENT FOR THESIS SUBMISSION NOTICE

#### **Download the briefing slide [HERE](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/PG-Seminar-Briefing.pdf)
.**

### **GUIDELINE FOR COURSE REGISTRATION**

Course Registration is mandatory. All students must register for courses offered in their respective semesters.

1.  Students can only register for the courses that are offered for a particular semester based on the rules and regulations set by the studentâ€™s faculty/school.
2.  Students are not allowed to register for the courses that are not offered in the particular semester by referring to your respective Study Plan.
3.  Students can perform course withdrawal (TD) for courses that have been registered for the particular semester. Course withdrawal can be done at a specific duration stated in the Work Schedule by using the Course Withdrawal Form (UTM.E/3-2) available on AMD Website _[here](https://amd.utm.my/pg-forms)
    _.
4.  If the student fails to do the course registration within the specific duration as stated in the Work Schedule, unless valid reasons are given, the student will be terminated from the University.
5.  Detail of postgraduate academic rules and regulations can be obtained at this link [_here_](https://sps.utm.my/policy-guidelines-v2)
    .
6.  Students may get more details regarding Course Registration, Lecture Timetable, and Academic Calendar below.
